# Landing Page Copy (High Conversion)

## The "Value Stack" (Features)

### âš¡ The Campus Flex (For Students)
* **The Tea Box:** Get anonymous gossip from your crush.

## The Upsell (Fear of Missing Out)
**Headline:** They Scanned You. Did You Know?
**Body:** Sending resumes is stressful. Stop guessing. With Recruiter Radar, get a notification:
> *"Your Resume was just scanned in Bangalore on an iPhone 15."*
**CTA:** [ Get Recruiter Alerts -> ]

## FAQ (Objection Killing)
* **"Will it scan?"** Yes. We use High-Error Correction. It scans instantly.
* **"How do I print?"** We give you a Print-Ready A4 PDF. Take it to any Xerox shop.

## Implementation Note (Next.js)
* **Hero Component:** `app/page.tsx`
* **Pricing Component:** `components/PricingTable.tsx`
* **Styles:** Use Tailwind Grid for the pricing cards.
